## IDecorator interface

Represents a decorator style fluent cascading API services registration / resolution interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IDecorator 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [build()](./typeioc.idecorator.build.md) | Creates an instance of [IContainer](./typeioc.icontainer.md) interface |
|  [by(service)](./typeioc.idecorator.by.md) | Specifies entry point into decorator fluent cascading API for service resolution |
|  [import(builder)](./typeioc.idecorator.import.md) | Imports registrations from non decorator container builder |
|  [provide(service)](./typeioc.idecorator.provide.md) | Registers a service using fluent API |
|  [provideSelf()](./typeioc.idecorator.provideself.md) | Sets registration to be marked as self registration |
|  [register(service)](./typeioc.idecorator.register.md) | Provides non decorator compatible registration interface |
|  [resolveValue(value)](./typeioc.idecorator.resolvevalue.md) | Specifies a value to be used for parameter resolution. It is used as is and no resolution computation is preformed |
